body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support team at Happy Hotels. My name is Jose Jackson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rachel. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently stayed at one of your hotels and I was a bit disappointed with the staff friendliness.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Rachel. To better assist you, may I please have your email address and phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is rachel.b@example.com and my phone number is seven one four eight two nine three six zero five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rachel. We will look into the matter and address your concerns promptly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Rachel. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
